name: Bomb Maze
description:
The game is called BOMB MAZE and is about finding a bomb. Once you find the bomb run as fast as you can to the top and blow your way through the walls to reach the goal at the top of the maze.

The game was made in around 2 months and was a small project I started because I got a idea and wanted to see how it turned out.

Webb: https://hawaiilive.wixsite.com/hawaii
